name.!doc: The name of the API whose permissions you want to query. Valid values are 'geolocation', 'midi', 'notifications', 'push', 'persistent-storage', 'camera' and 'microphone'.

userVisibleOnly.!doc: Indicates whether you want to show a notification for every message or be able to send silent push notifications. The default is false.

sysex.!doc: Indicates whether you need and/or receive system exclusive messages. The default is false.
